WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17.
53 FOOT M/V ERICA LYNN DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN
36-50.62N 073-43.81W AT 021424Z OCT. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK,
PHONE: 757 398 6231, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
